voiceerror: There was a problem found! You probably didn't give a valid link, or you should contact developer!
mustbe: You must be on a voice channel to make this work!

play.howto: Use /play [link] to start playing a music from link (you must be on a voice channel)

search.howto: Use /search [youtube video name] to start search for a video (you must be on a voice channel)

stop.howto: This command stops the bot from playing music
